title: 2 bed 2 Bath GOING FAST!!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Come home to the best of Colorado living at Knollwood Apartments.', 'Our beautiful community is nestled in the heart of Aurora, just outside of Denver.', 'Enjoy your favorite retail and dining destinations only minutes away at Town Center at Aurora.', 'Recreation enthusiasts will love our close proximity to the many parks in the area.', 'With easy access to I-225, your commute is sure to be a breeze.', 'Experience the excitement waiting for you at Knollwood Apartments!', 'With our selection of one and two bedroom apartments, finding the perfect home has never been easier.', 'Our spacious and inviting floor plans were thoughtfully designed to complement your lifestyle.', 'Each residence includes a fully-equipped, all-electric kitchen, plush carpeting, ceiling fans, vertical blinds, extra storage, and a balcony or patio.', 'Select homes feature a cozy wood burning fireplace, walk-in closets, and washer and dryer connections.', 'Knollwood Apartments combines quality and comfort for a place you can truly call home.', 'Step outside your home and take advantage of an array of premium community amenities.', 'Relax at the clubhouse, work out in our fitness center, entertain friends with a barbecue picnic, or soak up the sun by our shimmering swimming pool.', 'As a pet-friendly community, we gladly welcome your cats and dogs, so bring the whole family.', 'Indulge in life’s simple pleasures at Knollwood Apartments.', 'Schedule a tour today!', 'We can’t wait to show you around!', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Pets Welcome Upon Approval.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Maximum of 2 pets per home.$300 non-refundable pet fee is required.$25 monthly pet rent will be charged.', 'Cats must be spayed or neuteredCats and dog under one year of age will require a deposit equal to flooring replacement.', 'The following dog breeds or any mix of listed breeds will not be permitted: Bull Terriers (Pit, Staffordshire, etc.), Rottweiler, Chow, Doberman, American Bulldog, Presa Canario, Wolf Hybrid, and Shar Pei.', 'If your pet resembles any of these breeds, it could be denied.', 'Exotic and farm animals are not permitted.', 'Exotic pets include snakes, gerbils, ferrets, reptiles, etc.Pet Amenities:Free Pet TreatPet Waste Stations.', 'Deposit:', '$250-$350 with approved credit', 'Leasing options:', 'Leasing notes:', 'None', 'Application fee:', '$19 per applicant', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Water,
